## Quarto

Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document. To learn more about Quarto see <https://quarto.org>.

## Markdown Features

To learn more markdown basics for simple text formatting see <https://quarto.org/docs/authoring/markdown-basics.html>. You can also:

-   use Rstudio \> Help \> Markdown Quick Reference.
-   Rstudio \> Visual *mode* \> Format
